text: @realDonaldTrump Again, the coronavirus is at it's worst in the US, the cities are burning, you got accused of knowing about a bounty on Americans heads,  and you retweeted a "white power" piece of trash but with all this, last weekend you spent your time on racist monuments and golfing! https://t.co/Eel9FqLgJE
